trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en abstrakt basisklasse for en skript-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: ScriptControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: ScriptControl arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>klassen og implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>klassen er en basisklasse for ASP.NET Web serverkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
trans-unit.target: ScriptControl er en abstrakt klasse som du ikke kan starte direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class.
trans-unit.target: I stedet utledet en klasse som er basert på denne abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class tests the page for a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen ScriptControl tester siden for en <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>kontrollere under den `PreRender` fase kontrollens avledede.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to register script during the `Render` event.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen ScriptControl også sikrer at avledede kontrollen kaller metoder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>kontrollen for å registrere skriptet under den `Render` hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: This includes registering <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects for the ScriptControl when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter registrerer <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objekter for ScriptControl når den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method makes sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects are not rendered unless the ScriptControl itself is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>metoden, sikrer du at <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objekter kan ikke gjengis med mindre ScriptControl selve gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables a ScriptControl to work inside a closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette aktiverer ScriptControl til å kjøre i en lukket <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from ScriptControl.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til så mange beskrivelser og typer etter behov på en klasse som du avledes fra ScriptControl.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"></xref> class in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"> </xref> klassen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objekter for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>samling <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer skriptfiler for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>samlingen som inneholder ECMAScript (JavaScript)-filer som er registrert som innebygde ressurser.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers the script control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>hendelsen og registrerer skriptet styre med den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the script control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>hendelsen for basisklassen oppstår, den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>metoden registrerer skript-kontroll med den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> event and sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>hendelsen, og sender serverinnholdet til en angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> -objektet som skriver innholdet som skal gjengis til nettleseren.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet som skal motta kontrollinnholdet på serveren.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, registrerer det <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objekter for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>samling <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, registrerer skriptfiler for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>samlingen som inneholder ECMAScript (JavaScript)-filer som er registrert som innebygde ressurser.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
